## addAuthoringContentIfNonExistentAction variable

Adds this content item to the store only if the item does not exist, yet. If the item does not exist, this triggers a [addAuthoringContentAction](./redux-feature-auth-content.addauthoringcontentaction.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addAuthoringContentIfNonExistentAction: UnaryFunction<AuthoringContentItem, AddAuthoringContentIfNonExistentAction>
```
